title: Halloween with the Guy Next Door
description: CaitlinI've come to Snowflake Falls to escape my ex.This cozy small town is the opposite of the big city.But the guy next door is a tall, dark mystery.A hot-as-hell puzzle that has me moaning in my sleep.But is he as scary as he seems? AthanI've lived here a long time.People in town don't know what to make of me.When Caitlin moves in next door she captivates me.I want her by my side forever.But my secrets are not for the faint-hearted. This is a standalone story , but keep an eye out for recurring characters and families. Steamy, spooky insta-love short romance featuring some scares, ghosts, pumpkins, Snowflake Falls regulars and a happy-ever-after ending. Jessa x
author: Jessa Joy
